Instance.description: An objective that sets up special tracking in order to track special changes outside of tests.

TunableEnum.name: category_type
TunableEnum.description: What type of objective is this. Used for tests against types. If this objective doesn't need to be tested against, leave as NO_CATEGORY_TYPE.

TunableVariant.name: display_age_list
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, the Sim must be one of the specified ages for the Objective to be displayed in the UI. This does not create any Gameplay side checks to prevent this Objective from being completed anyways.

Tunable.name: display_text
Tunable.description: The single line description of the objective as it appears in various panels.

TunableVariant.name: picker_icon
TunableVariant.description: When this objective is shown in the picker, this is the icon that will be displayed beside it. If this objective will never appear in a picker, this can be left blank.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The icon used to represent this objective in the picker.

Tunable.name: relative_to_unlock_moment
Tunable.description: If true this objective will start counting from the moment of assignment or reset instead of over the total lifetime of a Sim, most useful for Careers and Whimsets. Note: this effect is only for 'Total' data tests (tests that used persisted save data)

Tunable.name: resettable
Tunable.description: Setting this allows for this objective to reset back to zero for certain uses, such as for Whim Set activation.

Tunable.name: satisfaction_points
Tunable.description: The number of satisfaction points received upon the completion of this Objective.

Tunable.name: show_progress
Tunable.description: If True, incremental progress is shown in UI. If False, progress display is disabled.

Tunable.name: show_tooltip_update_in_special_cases
Tunable.display: Show Tooltip Update In Special Cases
Tunable.description: If False the tooltip objective will not be displayed when updates and if the special cases are met (if there is a Small Business open) This has been implemented to avoid spamming the player with the aspiration tooltip update, for example the Fabulously Wealthy aspiration goals when earning money.

TunableVariant.name: tracking
TunableVariant.description: The method of tracking that we want to use.

Tunable.name: commodity_to_track
Tunable.description: The commodity that we want to track on the Sim.

TunableTuple.name: threshold
TunableTuple.description: The threshold that we are trying to reach.

TunableEnum.name: comparison
TunableEnum.description: The comparison to perform against the value.
